DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bioequivalence amodiaquine suspension ( Pfizer ) WHO approve reference product Flavoquine® tablet ( Sanofi Aventis ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Camoquin® Suspension ( Pfizer ) To Flavoquine® Tablets ( Sanofi Aventis ) In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . A history drug induce agranulocytosis history liver hematological problem take amodiaquine . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
